Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/checkbox

Function Figure checkbox(str text, void(bool state) vcallback, FProperty props...)
Description A checkbox that can be selected or deselected by the user. Whenever this occurs, vcallback is called. The state argument of the callback is true when the check box is checked (= selected).
